Question: AIPS Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AIPS Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Advanced Intelligent Health and Sports Leisure Solutions

- AIPS specializes in advanced intelligent health and sports leisure solutions, utilizing precision manufacturing and innovative technology.
- The company offers comprehensive solutions for quantifying user's training results through data gathering from devices and the human body.
- AIPS is set to showcase its solutions at CES 2024, aiming to spotlight Taiwan's technological prowess and create global economic opportunities in the industry.
- The company has received invitations from various countries and will participate in collaborative roadshows and thematic exchanges during the exhibition.

For more information, visit AIPS Official Website: https://www.aips.com.tw/
